column6: The Ultimates have journeyed into the Supremeverse to do battle. What awaits them there is something they did not expect: a glimpse at the destruction Reed Richards has caused! A whole world in chaos and one of the greatest minds is to blame!
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Greg Land | writer:Stan Lee | inker:Jay Leisten | colorist:Justin Ponsor
